title: Amy's Back In Studio! + Update On Lunchbox's Letters To Celebrities + Bobby’s Top 5 Dumbest Big Hits!
itunes:title: Amy's Back In Studio! + Update On Lunchbox's Letters To Celebrities + Bobby’s Top 5 Dumbest Big Hits!
description:
Amy is back in the studio and we couldn’t be happier to have her back! She talks about her dad who passed away in an unexpected turn of events. Bobby updates Amy on all the things she missed while she was gone. We get an update on the letters Lunchbox wrote to celebrities posing as a kid asking for a picture…have any of them responded? Plus, why is Eddie is wearing nail polish all week?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
